body_html:
This issue appears fixed if you use the docker image floydhub/1.5.0-gpu.cuda9cudnn7-py3_aws.33,

The referenced image floydhub/tensorflow:1.5.0-gpu.cuda9cudnn7-py3_aws.22 is 9 months old, and I can see they added TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=3.7,7.0 6 months ago:
https://github.com/floydhub/dockerfiles/blame/master/dl/tensorflow/1.5.0/Dockerfile-py3.gpu.cuda9cudnn7_aws

Future problems with floydhub docker images should be opened against that github repo.

body:
This issue appears fixed if you use the docker image floydhub/1.5.0-gpu.cuda9cudnn7-py3_aws.33, 

The referenced image floydhub/tensorflow:1.5.0-gpu.cuda9cudnn7-py3_aws.22 is 9 months old, and I can see they added TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=3.7,7.0   6 months ago:
https://github.com/floydhub/dockerfiles/blame/master/dl/tensorflow/1.5.0/Dockerfile-py3.gpu.cuda9cudnn7_aws

Future problems with floydhub docker images should be opened against that github repo.
